name: Keep Warm (Dagon_Dev, NewBrDev)
description:
A survival game made by Dagon and NewBrDev.

Apparently the world we know is ending, they say the"Ice Age" is coming. I need to do something!

Controls:

WASD: Move

Left-Click: Interact

E: Inventory/Craft

1: Axe

2: Pickaxe

3: Knife

AXE

Chop Tree

Pickaxe

Break Stone Boulder

Knife

Cut Grass
